p: Various methods for the quantitative determination of Î²-glucans are described in the literature. Among them, the following can be distinguished: the immunoenzymatic method (ELISA) [ 51], the fluorimetric method using aniline blue [ 29, 52], the spectrophotometric method with enzymatic hydrolysis [ 53, 54, 55] or the spectrophotometric method using Congo red [ 29], high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) [ 56] and others like Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) [ 57].
